data.actual_result: Standard emotes that are larger than the normal standard emotes are cut off
data.expected_result: The standard emotes that are larger than normal standard emotes shouldn’t be cut off
data.short_description: standard discord emojis that are a bit larger than others (example: both magnificent glasses) are cut off in emoji preview
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a text channel where u can chat - Click on the chatbox - Find any standard discord emote that are larger than other standard emotes - Observe the emotes being cut off
